document_data.name: Dragonbane amber
document_data.mainbody: '''Dragonbane amber''' was a type of [[magic]]al [[amber]] crystal usually found underground in [[Laerakond]].
document_data.Powers: The dragonbane amber had the quality to greatly weaken any nearby [[dragon]]s to the point of killing them if exposed to the crystal during prolonged periods of time, hence the name.
document_data.History:
Small quantities of dragonbane amber were uncovered after the [[Spellplague]] transported Laerakond to [[Toril]], Eventually, however, the reserves of dragonbane amber were depleted and dragons were able to retaliate and destroy the rebels.

In the 15th century DR, many adventurers and dragonslayers braved the dangerous lands of Skelkor and other dragon ruled nations in hopes to find new veins of dragonbane amber.
